text__recipe_creation_basics__head-note: We’re excited to see your recipe! Let’s start with the basics...
text__recipe_creation_add_recipe_photo:
Upload a final photo of your dish now
(or add it later)
text__recipe_creation_add_recipe_photo_d: Images must be a original personal photo, in .jpeg format, and a minimum size of 1000 x 1000 pixels.
test__recipe_creation_basics__portions-d: Choose between servings (a filling portion for one person) or pieces (e.g. slice of cake).
test__recipe_creation_basics__difficulty: How complicated is it to prepare your dish?
test__recipe_creation_basics__prep-time-: How much time do you actively spend making the dish? E.g. peeling, cutting, cooking...
test__recipe_creation_basics__backing-ti: How long does the dish need to bake for?
test__recipe_creation_basics__restimg-ti: Does the dish need to rest at any point? E.g. marinating, chilling, rising time...
text__image_upload_error_min_size: Error uploading picture. Your picture should have a minimum size of {{ size }} pixels.
error_message__min_length: The minimum length is {{ min }} letters.
error_message__max_length: The maximum length is {{ max }} letters.
error_message__min_value: The minimum value is {{ min }} letters.
error_message__max_value: The maximum value is {{ max }} letters.
text__recipe-creation-ingredients__head-: A recipe would be nothing without the ingredients! What goes in your dish?
text__empty-ingredients-text: You need to add at least one ingredient to submit your recipe
text__recipe-creation-chefs-note__descri: Tell us the story behind your dish or share some tips...
This is my favorite dessert and my Grandma’s original recipe. Try it with whipped cream!
text__recipe-creation-chefs-note__dish-t: Let’s add some categories to make you recipe easy to find! You can select as many as you like.
text__recipe-creation-steps__head-note: Sounds delicious! Now, it’s time to add the steps...
text__recipe-creation-steps__step-descri: Each recipe step should be helpful, easy to understand, and focus on clear actions related to the recipe. As an example, here's the final step for our Rigatoni with broccoli and sausage: “Add broccoli, rigatoni, pasta water, chili flakes, lemon zest and juice, and Parmesan cheese. Season with salt and pepper. To serve, garnish with basil and more cheese. Enjoy!”
text__recipe-creation-steps__description: What needs to be done in this step?
text__recipe-creation-steps-ingredient-p: You currently have no ingredients selected
text__empty-steps-sub-headline: You need to add at least one stp to submit your recipe
label__upload_step_photo: Upload a photo of this step
text__empty-steps-list-text: You need to add at least one step to submit your recipe
text__deleting-x-is-irreversible: Deleting your {{ value }} and its contents is irreversible.
